description:
Type of construction costs

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61261 Price indices for the construction industry

Definition:
Construction costs, total:
The construction cost index calculated by the Federal
Statistical Office shows the price movement of production
factors used by construction companies in the construction
of new residential buildings. These mainly include labour
and materials but also equipment, energy, supplies,
auxiliary products to construction and other cost factors.

Material costs:
The material cost index shows the price movement of
construction materials typically processed in individual
construction operations when new residential buildings are
constructed.

Labour costs:
The labour cost index reflects the movement of total labour
costs of all employees working in the construction industry
in Germany.
